title: Are 3 months enough to crack down IBPS clerk? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are ready to give at least 6 hours daily then it is more than enough. If you have your basics of each subject strong then it's too good & if you dont have good basics you can allot daily 1 hour to each subject - Quant, Reasoning & English. Apart from this 3 hours give 2 hours for Daily General Awareness & Statik GK portion so it won't create burden of study on you at the time of mains exam (I did the same mistake last time that I started general awareness after Pre result). Daily 1 hour to Editorial section & attempt daily quizzes from different platforms like Adda247, Gradeup, Affairscloud & Give mock tests.
yes u will ..am 100 percent sure. just scroll down my answer to what basics you required for bank exams. all the best
